about_the_game:
'Guns Full Access' DLC unlocks all existing and future released gun models for 'World of Guns: VR'.
All models are high-quality modeled with all parts. Each model can be disassembled and reassembled fully interactive.
Also, you may explore gun functionality with fire, reload and unload animations with slowdown and X-Ray support.
Currently the game has 190+ models, usually, we make 1 - 2 new models every month.
Attention! Full Access does not unlock Premium models!

Available models:

Pistols
  • Glock 19
  • CZ75
  • Colt 1911
  • SIG P228
  • Beretta 92FS
  • Desert Eagle .44
  • S&W Sigma
  • Springfield XDM

'Guns Full Access' DLC unlocks all existing and future released gun models for 'World of Guns: VR'.
All models are high-quality modeled with all parts. Each model can be disassembled and reassembled fully interactive.
Also, you may explore gun functionality with fire, reload and unload animations with slowdown and X-Ray support.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Sound Card: any

name: World of Guns VR: Guns Full Access

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: World of Guns VR: Guns Full Access - $49.99

package_groups.title: Buy World of Guns VR: Guns Full Access

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480, equivalent or better.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer, USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port.

short_description: World of Guns VR: Guns Full Access unlocks all existing and future released gun models for World of Guns: VR Currently there are 190 +gun models in the game. Attention! Full Access does not unlock Bonus models!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
